header.title: Smart Building Reporting Dashboard
header.description: Track device alerts, energy usage, and building status in real-time for smarter, more efficient operations.

startDate.label: Start Date
startDate.error: Start date is required and cannot be in the future.

endDate.label: End Date
endDate.error: End date cannot be before start date.

header.title: User Management in Smart Building
header.description: Manage user roles, accounts, and permissions for secure and efficient smart building access. Customize roles, activate/deactivate users, and enhance security.

assigne.title: Are you sure?
assigne.text: By adding this user to the building, they will gain access to the premises and any associated facilities based on their assigned permissions and roles.

delete.title: Are you sure?
delete.text: Deactivating this user cannot be undone immediately.By deactivating this user, their access will be restricted, and all associated settings and permissions will be disabled.

activate.title: Are you sure?
activate.text: This user account is currently inactive. By activating this user, their access will be restored, and they will regain all associated settings and permissions.

role_modal.text: Once deleted, this action cannot be undone. By deleting this role, you’ll permanently remove it, along with all associated settings, users and data.

roles_responsibilities.title: Roles & Responsibilities in Smart Building Management
roles_responsibilities.description: Define user roles and their permissions to ensure seamless control and automation of your smart building.

form.role_name_placeholder: Choose a name for your role

table.read_required_warning: ⚠️ "Read" must be checked if any other action is selected.

header.title: Smart IoT Threshold Manager
header.description: Monitor and control IoT device thresholds efficiently with real-time alerts and automation.

header.title: Smart IoT Scheduler
header.descp: Efficiently automate and manage your IoT devices with a powerful scheduling system.

alerts.title: Alert
alerts.energy_meter: Energy consumption threshold breached by {{device}} in {{location}}. Current value: {{value}} kWh.
alerts.temperature: Temperature threshold breached by {{device}} in {{location}}. Current value: {{value}} °C.

profile_setting.title: Profile Settings
profile_setting.upload_note: Supports only PNGs and JPEGs under 5MB.

airQualityInfo.text_building: This value is the daily average based on all sensors on this building. It helps you monitor general air quality without checking each space.
airQualityInfo.text_floor: This value is the daily average based on all sensors on this floor. It helps you monitor general air quality without checking each space.

occupancyInfo.text_building: This value is the daily average based on all sensors on this building. It helps you monitor general Occupancy  without checking each space.
occupancyInfo.text_floor: This value is the daily average based on all sensors on this floor. It helps you monitor general Occupancy without checking each space.

error_placeholder.title: Server Unavailable
error_placeholder.message: We're having trouble connecting to our servers right now. This might be a temporary issue with our service.
error_placeholder.instruction: If the problem persists, please check your internet connection or try again later.

file_image.invalidType: Invalid file type! Only PNGs and JPEGs allowed.

validation.passwordPattern: Your password must include at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character.
validation.passwordLength: Password must be between 8 and 24 characters.
validation.usernameFormat: Username must contain alphabets only and spaces, max 50 characters.
